GSD.product_version: versions from v5.15 to before v5.17.13
GSD.description:
fs/ntfs3: validate BOOT sectors_per_clusters

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.17.13 by commit 4746c49b11b2403f5b5b07c6eac9e60663dcd9a3, it was introduced in version v5.15 by commit 82cae269cfa953032fbb8980a7d554d60fb00b17. For more details please see the references link.
